response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, aligning perfectly with your needs and aspirations. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, which I believe is an excellent opportunity considering its true worth of $1,200,000. I trust that you will find this offer both compelling and advantageous. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
